mapper.insert: insert into users(u_no, u_id, u_pwd, u_mail, u_mygenre) values( users_seq.nextVal, #{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_mail}, #{u_mygenre} )
mapper.select: select u.u_no, u.u_id, u.u_mail, u.u_mygenre, u.u_verify, u.u_lock from users u where u.u_id=#{u_id} and u.u_pwd=#{u_pwd}
select count(*) as cnt from users where u_id=#{userid}
select count(*) as cnt from users where u_mail=#{u_mail}
mapper.update: update users set u_verify=#{u_verify} where u_id=#{u_id}
update users set u_lock=#{u_lock} where u_id = #{u_id}
